大File橫轉直（by餓咩爹多）
首先要裝咗
* 7-Zip (或WinRAR)
* Notepad++ (或者你歡喜嘅editor)
* Kindle Previewer: http://www.jebook.org/index.php/archives/238

1. 先用7-Zip打開個epub，將裏面嘅stylesheet.css(未必叫stylesheet)解壓縮，如果想掉轉揭頁方向就解埋content.opf，個7-Zip唔使熄住
2. 用Notepad++打開stylesheet.css，加以下內容落最底:

body {
writing-mode: vertical-rl;
-webkit-writing-mode: vertical-rl;
-epub-writing-mode: vertical-rl;
margin-left: 10px;
margin-right: 10px;
margin-top: 5px;
margin-bottom: 5px;
}

3. 如果要掉轉揭頁方向打開content.opf，將 改做

4. 將改咗嘅file拉返入去7-Zip
5. 打開Kindle Previewer，Device揀Kindle e-ink，拉個epub入去，就會轉咗做mobi去同一folder入面嘅「converted你本epub檔名-epub」
啲白邊太多太少可以調stylesheet.css

I get a kindle paper white 2015 with special offer,but I am in Hong kong,i can't use the special offer,can you help me to remove the special offer on my kindle?

08:55 AM PDT Rick(Amazon): Hello, my name is Rick. I'm here to help you today.
Sure
08:56 AM PDT *****: Hi
08:56 AM PDT Rick: Are you referring to ***** Kindle ?
08:56 AM PDT *****: Yes
08:57 AM PDT Rick: One moment please
08:57 AM PDT *****: Sure
09:00 AM PDT *****: Any problems?
09:00 AM PDT Rick: Done
09:00 AM PDT *****: Oh Thank you
